# Pestilence (Domain)
## Overview

**Granted Powers:** You gain immunity to the effects of all diseases, though you can still carry infectious diseases.

**Pestilence Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Doom (Spell)|Doom]]****:** One subject takes â€“2 on attacks, damage, saves, and checks.

**2** **[[Summon Swarm (Spell)|Summon Swarm]]****:** Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

**3** **[[Contagion (Spell)|Contagion]]****:** Infects subject with chosen disease.

**4** **[[Poison Spells|Poison]]****:** Touch deals 1d10 Con damage, repeats in 1 minute.

**5** **[[Plague of Rats (Spell)|Plague of Rats]]****:** Summons horde of rats.

**6 [[Spawn Wererats (Spell)|Spawn Wererats]]:** Kills subject and summons wererats.

**7 [[Scourge (Spell)|Scourge]]:** Inflicts a disease that must be magically cured, one subject/level.

**8** **[[Horrid Wilting (Spell)|Horrid Wilting]]****:** Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

**9** **[[Otyugh Swarm (Spell)|Otyugh Swarm]]****:** Creates 3d4 otyughs or 1d3+1 Huge otyughs.
